name: Sankalp Sewa Sansthan
briefDescription: Sankalp Sewa Sansthan (SSS) is a voluntary organization established and registered in 2004 by a group of Professional social workers under society registration act. 1860 vide registration number 702 dated 8 September 2004 at varanasi as well as registered under foreign contribution (regulation) act 2010 (FCRA) under ministry of home affairs govt. of india vide registration number- 136760203 dated 11 January 2012. Organization has also 80 G and 12 A certificate under income tax act 1961. It is inspired its motto of Manav Sewa Hi Sankalp Hai.The organization is working in the areas of improving the living status of the people living in the villages with special focus to the well being of Children, Women of under privileged, Youth empowermen
